text: The King of Comedy is a 1982/83 American black comedy movie directed by Martin Scorsese and starring Robert De Niro, Jerry Lewis, Sandra Bernhard, Diahnne Abbott, Shelley Hack, Margo Winkler, Kim Chan. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1982 comedy movies Category:1983 comedy movies Category:1980s black comedy movies Category:American black comedy movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Martin Scorsese Category:1982 comedy-drama movies Category:Movies about abduction Category:Movies about stalking Category:Movies about television Category:Movies about comedians Category:Movies set in New York City Category:1980s English-language movies
title: The King of Comedy (1983 movie)
